code: export var SET_LOGIN='SET_LOGIN';export var SET_CLOUD='SET_CLOUD';export var SET_STAR='SET_STAR';export var SET_LANG='SET_LANG';export var SET_THEME_MODE='SET_THEME_MODE';export function setLogin(state){return{type:SET_LOGIN,loginState:state};}export function setCloud(state){return{type:SET_CLOUD,cloudState:state};}export function setStar(state){return{type:SET_STAR,starState:state};}export function setCurrLang(state){return{type:SET_LANG,currLangState:state};}export function setThemeMode(state){return{type:SET_THEME_MODE,themeModeState:state};}
